meanings.definition: Remove scale or deposits from (a surface)
meanings.sent1: I need to start descaling the coffee maker to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: She descaled the showerhead to improve water flow.
meanings.sent3: After descaling the kettle, it looked as good as new.
meanings.sent4: The descaling process was like wiping away years of neglect.
meanings.sent5: Descaling is important to prevent mineral buildup in appliances.

meanings.definition: The process of removing scale or deposits from (a surface)
meanings.sent1: Regular descaling of the dishwasher helps maintain its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The descaling of the pipes was necessary to prevent clogging.
meanings.sent3: The descaling of the statue revealed intricate details hidden beneath.
meanings.sent4: The descaling of the old building brought out its original beauty.
meanings.sent5: Descaling is a common maintenance task in households and industries alike.
